cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on May 11, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6404, Legislation to Name United States Post Offices

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 9 (Thursday, January 13, 2022)]
[House]
[Pages H194-H195]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LaHOOD:
H.R. 6404.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
[[Page H195]]
Article 1 Section 8 Clause 7: The Congress shall have Power
to establish Post Offices and post Roads;

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 114 North Magnolia Street in Elmwood, Illinois, as the "Corporal Benjamin Desilets Post Office".
